txt.en: Your continued efforts to aid the Kintai Elves brings great joy to them. You should visit Thridarlan at Shonith to receive a gift from the Elves of the oasis.
Reach Acquaintance tier with the Adúrhid
Your continued assistance with the goals and objective of the Kintai Elves earns you merit among them. They wish to honour your efforts with a gift at Shonith.

'We are pleased you have proven so noble.\n\n'We do not open our lands to many, as we have little left. To see that you are willing to aid us is a portent. We hope it is a portent of a change for the better. Though we know our fates our chosen.'
Your standing with the Adúrhid improves and earns you a gift from the Ikorbâni Elves.

'We welcome the aid of our cousins.

'We know you cannot understand our choices or how we remained. In truth that knowledge is lost to us as well.

'We are, however, grateful that you assist us now.'
Your continued assistance with the goals and objective of the Kintai Elves earns you merit among them. They wish to honour your efforts with a gift at Shonith.
Visit Thridarlan at Shonith to receive a gift
